geminiOffer.body: Experience the world of AI coding with the powerful Google Gemini model! New GCP users who sign up and get a Gemini API key will receive $300 in free credits valid for 3 months. Don't miss this special opportunity! (Details: here)

coreFeatures.header: Start 'Vibe Coding' with Caret, the AI coding agent that grows with you.
coreFeatures.description: Multi-language support, developer-led AI orchestration, customizable workflows, transparent AI control, and powerful local LLM integration. Beyond simple conversations, Caret proposes a 'Vibe Coding' development culture where you systematically create documents with AI and grow together based on those records.

modelFlexibility.header: Choose your model freely, unlimited possibilities
modelFlexibility.body: Caret is not tied to specific vendors. Easily connect your own local sLLM through Ollama or use various external API keys you're already using like Anthropic Claude, OpenAI, and more. Choose the optimal AI for your project and style.

caretAccount.header: Coming Soon! Caret Integrated Subscription Service (Monthly)
caretAccount.body: No more complex API key setup! With the upcoming Caret integrated account (monthly subscription), you'll be able to use carefully selected high-performance AI agents including Google Gemini right away. Be the first to get the latest news!

educationOffer.header: ‚ú® Start Now! Free 'Vibe Coding' Education & Google Gemini $300 Credit Tips!
educationOffer.body: Join our open-source education program to learn real 'Vibe Coding' with Caret and experience the full AI blogger agent development process! This program is provided for free and offers warm guidance and a rich practice environment needed to take your first real steps in AI development. We also provide $300 GCP credit utilization tips for 3 months for those using Google Gemini API for the first time. Experience the joy of AI development without cost burden! (Education program and Gemini credit tips Learn more)

personaSelector.description: Select the personality of your AI agent companion. Each persona has unique communication styles and expertise.

community.body:
Connect with other developers using Caret! As an open-source project, Caret grows through your participation in our GitHub repository - report issues, suggest features, and help us evolve together.

apiSetup.title: üîß API Setup
apiSetup.description: Set up your AI API to use Caret.
apiSetup.instructions: Subscribe to Caret or set up API keys for OpenAI, Anthropic, or other AI services, or configure local LLM.
